column5: Going to be through there Labor Day weekend on my way to Ear Falls. Do they sell leaches?? I understand that The Sportsman will not have any. Suggestions?? Thank you
Call Dutchie's at (807) 529-6556. Good folks who will help you if they can.

If Dutchies doesn't have them, you can try Rainbow Point which is just across the road and maybe 200 yards north. Bobbies in Virmilion Bay would be a good bet too. I'd bet my next paycheck that you can always buy leeches at Rainy Lake Sports in Fort Frances.
I was in both Dutchies and the Rainbow today. They both have leeches right now. Put in a call before your trip and reseve some.
